turns.content: I need the default midi mappings of populár electronic drums

Here are some common default MIDI mappings for popular electronic drum kits:

1. Roland V-Drums:
	* Kick drum: MIDI note 36
	* Snare drum: MIDI note 38
	* Hi-hat: MIDI note 42 (closed), MIDI note 46 (open)
	* Tom 1: MIDI note 43
	* Tom 2: MIDI note 45
	* Tom 3: MIDI note 47
	* Crash cymbal: MIDI note 49
	* Ride cymbal: MIDI note 51
2. Alesis Nitro Mesh Kit:
	* Kick drum: MIDI note 36
	* Snare drum: MIDI note 38
	* Hi-hat: MIDI note 42 (closed), MIDI note 46 (open)
	* Tom 1: MIDI note 48
	* Tom 2: MIDI note 45
	* Tom 3: MIDI note 43
	* Crash cymbal: MIDI note 49
	* Ride cymbal: MIDI note 51
3. Yamaha DTX400

Sure, here are the top 5 electronic drum kits from Roland, a well-known manufacturer of electronic drums:

1. Roland TD-50KVX: This is Roland's flagship electronic drum kit, and it features a high-end sound
Can you generate it in a common json format? I need their manufacturer, model name and possible versions as well. I would like to recognize them in web midi

Sure, here's an example of a JSON format that includes the manufacturer, model name, and possible versions of electronic drum kits:
```json
{
  "electronic_drums": [
    {
      "manufacturer": "Roland",
      "model": "TD-50KVX",
      "versions": [
        "TD-50KVX-S",
        "TD-50KVX-WL",
        "TD-50KVX-EXP",
        "TD-50KVX-ECOM"
      ]
    },
    {
      "manufacturer": "Roland",
      "model
```
This looks good but add midi mapping, too

Sure, here's an updated example of the JSON format that includes the manufacturer, model name, possible versions, and MIDI mappings of electronic drum kits:
```json

  "electronic_drums": [
    {
      "manufacturer": "Roland",
      "model": "TD-50KVX",
      "versions": [
        "TD-50KVX-S",
        "TD-50KVX-WL",
        "TD-50KVX-EXP",
        "TD-50KVX-ECOM"
      ],
      "midi_mappings": [
        {"kick": 36},
        {"snare": 38},
        {"hi_hat_closed": 42},
        {"hi_hat_open": 46},
        {"tom_1": 43},
```
